Package jade.ui.aim

Class Summary
Aim Base class for targeting systems.
Closest Automatically selects the location of the closest allowed target, excluding the location of the Camera itself.
Directional Allows the user to select the closest valid target in a cardinal direction.
Free A targeting system that is free to choose any tile in the field of view of the Camera.
Letter Replaces all possible targets with a letter and allows the user to select one.
Select Similar to free, but with restrictions based on a target type.
